summary: A female acrobat and a thief plans to steal the gold from the mint. The evil manager have his own plans.
cast: Junko Miyazono|Tomisaburô Wakayama|Kunio Murai|Hôsei Komatsu|Gannosuke Ashiya|Keiko Kojima|Yuriko Mishima|Kinji Nakamura|Kôji Nanbara|Hiroshi Nawa|Kôji Sekiyama|Shinji Takano
title: Yôen dokufu-den: Han'nya no Ohyaku
